The sample is a probability diminishing sample, which was prepared with a multi-stage proportionally stratified selection process. At the first stage the settlements were selected, at the second stage within the settlement the respondents were selected with a simple random sampling process. The initial sample was 5112 persons, no supplementary addresses were used.
